p: Regarding the improvement of the posttreatment EPS, PDS, and GSRS scores, the improvement chance in the intervention group was 27%, 30%, and 27% higher than the control group, respectively (OR 1.27, CI 95% (1.04-1.56), p = 0.01) (OR 1.30, CI 95% (1.09-1.55), p < 0.01) (OR 1.27, CI 95% (1.10-1.45), p < 0.01).
